SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_alarm_list a WHERE a.DeleteDate IS NULL AND a.UserCode = #{userID} AND a.IsNew IS NULL AND a.ReceivedDate > SYSDATE - (INTERVAL '14' DAY)
AND ReservedInt1 is null
AND ReservedInt1 = -1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.ProcessID FROM JWF_PROCESS A INNER JOIN JWF_WORKITEM B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN JWF_PERFORMER C ON B.WorkItemID = C.WorkItemID INNER JOIN JWF_PROCESSDESCRIPTION D ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = D.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE C.UserCode = #{userID} AND C.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T019') AND C.State = 1 AND B.State = 288 AND A.ProcessState = 288 AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT A.ProcessID FROM JWF_PROCESS A INNER JOIN JWF_WORKITEM B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN JWF_PERFORMER C ON B.WorkItemID = C.WorkItemID INNER JOIN JWF_PROCESSDESCRIPTION D ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = D.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE B.DeputyID = #{userID} AND C.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017') AND C.State = 1 AND B.State = 288 AND A.ProcessState = 288 AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL
) ApprovalList

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT E.EventID, E.FolderType FROM EVENT E LEFT JOIN EVENT_DATE ED ON E.EventID = ED.EventID INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER FD ON E.FolderID = FD.FolderID AND FD.FolderType = 'Schedule.Person' AND FD.DeleteDate IS NULL WHERE SUBSTR(#{localCurrentDate}, 1, 10) BETWEEN ED.StartDate AND ED.EndDate
AND E.FolderID IN
#{item}
AND E.DeleteDate IS NULL AND E.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND (E.RegisterCode = #{userID} OR E.OwnerCode = #{userID} )
UNION ALL
SELECT E.EventID, E.FolderType FROM EVENT E LEFT JOIN EVENT LE ON E.LinkEventID = LE.EventID AND LE.DeleteDate IS NULL LEFT JOIN EVENT_DATE ED ON LE.EventID = ED.EventID INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER FD ON E.FolderID = FD.FolderID AND FD.FolderType = 'Schedule.Person' AND FD.DeleteDate IS NULL WHERE SUBSTR(#{localCurrentDate}, 1, 10) BETWEEN ED.StartDate AND ED.EndDate
AND E.FolderID IN
#{item}
AND E.DeleteDate IS NULL AND E.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND E.OwnerCode = #{userID} AND E.EventType = 'A'
UNION ALL
SELECT E.EventID, E.FolderType FROM EVENT E LEFT JOIN EVENT_DATE ED ON E.EventID = ED.EventID INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER FD ON E.FolderID = FD.FolderID AND FD.FolderType <> 'Schedule.Person' AND FD.DeleteDate IS NULL WHERE SUBSTR(#{localCurrentDate}, 1, 10) BETWEEN ED.StartDate AND ED.EndDate
AND E.FolderID IN
#{item}
AND E.DeleteDate IS NULL AND E.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND FD.FolderType LIKE 'Schedule%' UNION ALL
SELECT E.EventID, E.FolderType FROM EVENT E INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER FD ON FD.FolderType = 'Schedule.Share' INNER JOIN EVENT_SHARE ES ON ES.SpecifierCode = E.OwnerCode AND ES.TargetCode = #{userID} INNER JOIN EVENT_DATE ED ON E.EventID = ED.EventID WHERE E.FolderType = 'Schedule.Person' AND SUBSTR(#{localCurrentDate}, 1, 10) BETWEEN ED.StartDate AND ED.EndDate AND E.DeleteDate IS NULL AND E.IsDisplay = 'Y' ) A WHERE FolderType LIKE '%'||'Schedule'||'%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.SurveyID , A.SurveyStartDate AS D_SurveyStartDate , A.SurveyEndDate AS D_SurveyEndDate , Fn_SurveyTargetRespondent_R(A.SurveyID,#{userID}) AS IsTargetRespondent FROM survey A LEFT JOIN survey_respondent B ON A.SurveyID = B.SurveyID AND B.RespondentCode = #{userID} WHERE A.State = 'F' AND B.SurveyID IS NULL AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL AND CommunityID = 0 ) Proc WHERE Proc.IsTargetRespondent = 'Y' AND D_SurveyStartDate <= TO_DATE(#{localCurrentDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND D_SurveyEndDate >= TO_DATE(#{localCurrentDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
